entry.title: The Bonds that Bind
entry.summary:
Author: applejuice382

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 111,866Chapters: 11/15Kudos: 333

Summary: Stiles is just trying to prevent the next supernatural problem from gracing their doorstep. Derek is just trying to keep his pack alive (and ignore the desperation that crawls under his skin whenever Stiles is near).When Stiles goes deep into the preserve to investigate a string of murders, he and Derek are kidnapped by an unknown group and locked in a basement with no escape. Every night brings new suffering, and each day there is nothing to occupy themselves with except each other.The two will have to lean on one another to keep their sanity intact, and they’ll have to work together to escape.Too bad they annoy the shit out of each other.

entry.title: Alpha's Power
entry.summary:
Author: Aetherial_Book_God

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,454Chapters: 29/30Kudos: 176

Summary: Being Alpha meant Derek had to be the strongest, he had to be strong enough to keep the pack alive. He had to be the one whom the pack looked to for answers, so why was it so hard to say no to the temptation all around him? Particularly food and a certain ADHD human male who seemed to always be there when Derek needed him the most. As Derek's walls begin to crumble Stiles is right there at his side, encouraging him to relax, but Derek can't. He couldn't let down another family, he couldn't have what happened to his family happen to this pack. But what was so bad about letting go every once in a while?

entry.title: he's got a key to my heart (and my handcuffs)
entry.summary:
Author: ColorMeParanoid

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,044Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 87

Summary: Experimenting while single required creativity, which Stiles had in abundance. What he severely lacked in, however, was patience. And Stiles had done a lot of stupid things in his lifetime, but as he tugged uselessly at the handcuffs that kept him chained to his bed by his rapidly bruising wrist, he couldn’t deny that this had to be one of the stupidest ones to date.Especially when there was a loud, thundering knock on his door and a deep, male voice called out the words, “Fire department!”God, what an absolute nightmare this day had turned out to be.

entry.title: Queer as Wolf: A Perspective on Queerness and Bisexuality in Season 1
entry.summary:
Author: Hoechlin

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,105Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: The subtextual exploration of queerness in Teen Wolf Season 1 is deeply woven into its supernatural allegory, using Scott’s dual identity as a werewolf to mirror the tension between societal heteronormativity and the latent, often repressed, possibilities of queerness.Scott’s struggle to reconcile his human life (symbolized by Allison) and his supernatural existence (embodied by Derek) mirrors the internal conflict of someone grappling with their sexuality —particularly bisexuality— in a world that demands binary choices.

entry.title: Rewilding of Beacon Hills
entry.summary:
Author: SolsticeLostHerMind

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,926Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 12

Summary: Stiles goes looking for a missing girl and finds a man that’s both beauty and beast. It only get weirder from there. The trees and picture frames whisper to him, memories and power long forgotten are forced to the surface, and Stiles is somehow the key to breaking a six year old curse and reseeding magic in his fading town… preferably before the enemy gets their hands on even more power—or his father. Which would be a lot easier if the people around him would stop getting so complicated.

entry.title: The Phase That Pays
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,822Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 71

Summary: After the nogitsune, Stiles learned how to disappear quietly.In oversized clothes, empty laughter, and meals that end in cold porcelain, he unravels slowly—in corners no one looks at,in details no one knows how to name.The pack sees him.They just don’t know how to help.But Derek does.With glances that linger too long, with silences that speak louder than words,he starts picking up the pieces before Stiles even realizes he's breaking.This is a story about someone who’s forgotten how to exist—and someone who chooses to stay anyway.

entry.title: symphonic devotion
entry.summary:
Author: hansuckss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,281Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 8

Summary: “When fate is messed with, it punishes those who messes with the flow of time and rewards those who were affected.”  After taking his own life in a bathtub, Derek Hale wakes up as a ghost trapped in a strange, distorted version of his neighborhood—alongside another ghost named ‘Stiles’. Neither remembers anything about their past, but they're inexplicably tied to one another. All they have to guide them are an old piano and two eerily familiar houses.Or; two memory-less spirits search for answers about who they were, why they're connected, and what this so-called “happy ending” is all about—only to discover comfort and companionship in each other along the way. - as seen on wattpad -

Author: nyangibun

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,915Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 85

Summary: Stiles is a Spark. Some kind of rare ancient Spark.To make matters worse (or better), he’s accidentally bonded himself to Derek and his pack, erring on the side of unhealthy codependency.But family for Stiles has always been his Dad, him, and Scott—or was Scott.So maybe an emotionally constipated, broody werewolf Alpha and his little merry crew of misfit Betas might be exactly the kind of family Stiles needs right now.((AKA the one where Stiles awakens powers that seem to really like Derek))

entry.title: This Is Not Me Falling for You (Except It Definitely Is)
entry.summary:
Author: Hathly

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,179Chapters: 2/12Kudos: 34

Summary: Stiles didn’t expect to see Derek Hale at college. Not after years of teenage antagonism, not after that one summer where Derek glared at him for breathing too loud. But suddenly Derek is here—older, hotter, and somehow the only person who knows Stiles’ schedule better than his own.Now they’re kind-of-maybe friends. If friends argued over superhero rankings, walked each other to class like it’s a rom-com, and accidentally held hands under the stars.
